May 20, 2000 D Luzerner Kantonales Jugendmusikfest (Brass Band)
Luzerner Kantonales Jugendmusikfest (Mittelstufe BB) 30 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Luzerner Kantonales Jugendmusikfest luzerner-kantonales-jugendmusikfest-mitt-4398
None Switzerland
Kriens, LU, Switzerland 1st Edition of this Youth -Band Contest.
> at the Beginning there was just a Section for Brass Band and one for the Wind Bands. This first Event had already totally 16 Bands to compete.
April 11, 2016, 3:49 p.m. May 20, 2017, 2:34 p.m.
1 Regionale Jugend Brass Band Luzern Christoph Müller A Malvern Suite
2 Young Brassers Ettiswil-Grosswangen-Buttisholz Stephan Hodel Free World Fantasy
3 Jugend Brass Band Hürntal Josef Brun Appalachian Mountain Folk Song Suite
4 Jugend Brass Band Flühli-Sörenberg Martin Bieri Pacific Dreams
5 Jugend Brass Band Nebikon-Altishofen-Schötz Markus Huwyler Music for Greenwich
6 Jugend Brass Band Hildisrieden-Schwarzenberg Alex Troxler Overture on an Early Swiss Folk Song
